meta.title: Contract #004: The Insider
meta.description: INTELLIGENCE ALERT: Contradictory data detected. Click minimise to bin false evidence.
meta.journal: The Security Log was fabricated. Someone logged the room 'Empty' manually while the Head of IT was physically inside exporting the database. This was an inside job.

nodes.text: 01:15 - Door Sensor: Server Room B access granted via ID Card #449.
01:16 - CCTV: Subject identified as Head of IT enters Server Room B.
01:18 - Security Log: Patrol Officer reports Server Room B is empty and locked.
01:20 - Network Log: Manual override of firewalls initiated from Server Room B terminal.
01:25 - System Alert: Confidential database export started.
